extendedInfo.description: Finding information is faster with Tulsa City-County Libraryâs mobile, instant access gateway.  From library locations and hours to a world of electronic book downloads, we now provide the information anytime you need.  Convenience is the key to connecting with a librarian, searching the library catalog, downloading the latest bestseller and sharing your insight with other readers. Join the libraryâs mobile community to follow the latest trending book topics in your area.Results for books, DVDs, audiobooks, CDs, periodicals and library events are available instantly.  Renew items or place holds on your next library checkout and have it sent to the library of your convenience.  Learn recommendations on what to read next from TCCL librarians at the forefront of information and publishing industries.  Text a librarian your questions for quick answers with cited references.As information providers, our goal is to provide accurate and timely answers. Our newest mobile outreach is a tool that connects Tulsaâs community of library customers with a world of information.

reviews.title: Dislike the Changes
reviews.comment: I used to check out Ebooks every few days. I can go through 10 books a week. I read every chance I get. But the new Overdrive catalogue drives me nuts. It\'s harder to browse genres. You cannot search a subject in Advanced, only title author and genre. And a filter to search available titles only on general searches would be helpful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!!!!!
reviews.comment: It is great!!! And easy to use!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Download...
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t always let you log in to download! Very frustrating!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I have been eagerly waiting for this app and it is perfect!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Has Potential
reviews.comment: App just links to Library website. Wish the app was \"actually\" an app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: I absolutely love this app. I can request books straight from my phone and pick them up at my library. I can download books easily too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Is a real app
reviews.comment: Not just a connection to the web site.  Works well on my devices.  The library does need to differentiate Kindle ebooks from epub.   Some kindle books must be loaded via usb - not possible on Android devices.
reviews.author: A Google User
